Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and service.”

Reviews.Content: stayed six nights service accomodation excellent clean modern spacious sound proof windows bathroom shower bath staff helpful directions planning tours spoke english location minutes walk train bus five minute walk river seine lovely plenty cafes nearby shops supermarket

Reviews.Title: “Chic Parisien boutique hotel in an excellent location”

Reviews.Content: lovely little hotel set amidst yuppie district st germain nestled treelined street tucked main road la villa newish boutique hotel encompasses parisian chic warmth hotel nondescript 3 similar hotels block rue de jacob la villa comes ones hotels understated minimalist spotless eye detail la villa cosy size bathroom bathtub designer sink try figure water french window overlooks street typical view typical parisian sidestreet oozes charm paris spotless 40 tv channels 2 bbc cnn english thats france boutique hotel la villa tiny bar reception breakfast basement price breakfast id highly recommend heading cafes restaurants nearby location hotel couldnt hustle bustle main street blvd st germain cosy cafes outside hotel tearoom sells amazing macaroons opposite discovered quaint little parisian restaurant amazing food du pied de round corner couple minutes walk hotel heart st germain des pres bars restaurants cafes al fresco dining set people watching forgot walkable paris easier wander foot battle maze metro 20 minute walk latin quarter plenty cafes restaurants abound considerably expensive st germain loved little gem hotel definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location and Stylish Decor”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights arrival told rooftop booked upgraded junior suite suite lovely seperate sleeping sitting modern 5th floor quiet night despite central minor negatives bottles mineral water bed arrival replaced cost expected overbath shower bathroom bit dated powerful bath difficult climb didnt eat breakfast hotel cant comment drinks bar couple evenings service excellent night served wasnt bar wasnt gins stocked served ice staff hotel friendly helpful despite rusty french definitely recommend hotel location perfect near metro walkable sights lots nice bars restaurants cafes shops roundabout street nice quiet night

Reviews.Title: “Superb location in the heart of the left bank & easy walking to a host of Paris sights. Will definitely stay here again!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2000 travelled solo paris business trip little nervous wouldnt remembered live positive comments time stayed 4 nights absolutely recalled husband equally impressed spotless modern chic double glazed windows fresh air stayed 43 incredibly spacious own separate sitting fabulous stay little noisy windows disturb preferred sacrifice little street noise fresh air confess location hotel absolutely love heart left bank easy walking louvre notre dame eiffel tower center paris streets explore stroll soaking atmosphere cafes boulangeries restaurants art galleries shops short stroll meal snack drink sit people watch sipping drink cafe chose eat breakfast hotel croissants coffee nearby cafes wonderful short stroll metro station easily venture afield montmarte ease stay trip paris

Reviews.Title: “Great location - stylish and no frills”
Reviews.Author: SummerhouseKent
Reviews.Content: ideal location makes easy explore access sights via walks bridges plenty restaurants choose moderate size stylishly finished – don’t expect bathroom luxe super comfortable breakfast improved stayed 3 times main event france

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location - the best neighbourhood for chic boutiques”
